Body:
train_data = mz.datasets.wiki_qa.load_data('train', task='ranking')
assert len(train_data) == 20360
train_data, _ = mz.datasets.wiki_qa.load_data('train', task=
    'classification', return_classes=True)
assert len(train_data) == 20360
dev_data = mz.datasets.wiki_qa.load_data('dev', task='ranking', filtered=False)
assert len(dev_data) == 2733
dev_data, tag = mz.datasets.wiki_qa.load_data('dev', task='classification',
    filtered=True, return_classes=True)
assert len(dev_data) == 1126
assert tag == [False, True]
test_data = mz.datasets.wiki_qa.load_data('test', task='ranking', filtered=
    False)
assert len(test_data) == 6165
test_data, tag = mz.datasets.wiki_qa.load_data('test', task=
    'classification', filtered=True, return_classes=True)
assert len(test_data) == 2341
assert tag == [False, True]
pytest.mark.cron
